page.title: 16A Day in my life
page.content: It was Saturday morning about 7.45. I climbed out of bed,washed and dressed. I had my breakfast then took Boomer,my dog,for a walk. It was 8.30 when I got back. I called for Gaye and we went in the van to the stables.When we arrived we got the feeds ready. I fed Yorkie, the calf, and then mucked out the {horses,}Fire and Barney, and filled the haynets. First I groomed Barney, then Fire. I rode Fire and jumped him. The highest jump was 3ft 9ins. After I had ridden Fire I took Barney on a ride for two and a half hours. When I got home I had my dinner and helped my mum then we went shopping. I got a new skirt,and top and some trainers. When I got back I had my tea and then got changed again to go to the stables. We bedded the horses down and fed the {calves.}I collected the eggs and put the{chickens}away. Then I went home.
